00021 #define PDIEFRAME             22
00022 
00023 ////
00024 // Process the stuff of the player when playing in a normal level
00025 void CPlayer::processInLevel()
00026 {
00027     StatusBox();
00028 
00029     if (pdie) dieanim();
00030  else
00031  {
00032   inhibitwalking = false;
00033   inhibitfall = false;
00034   
00035   // when walking through the exit door don't show keen's sprite past
00036   // the door frame (so it looks like he walks "through" the door)
00037   if(!pfrozentime)
00038   {
00039    if (!level_done)
00040     ProcessInput();
00041    else
00042     ProcessExitLevel();
00043   }
00044   
00045   setDir();
00046   
00047   if(!level_done)
00048   {
00049    getgoodies();
00050    raygun();
00051    keencicle();
00052   }
00053   
00054   if(!pfrozentime)
00055   {
00056    if(!pjumping)
00057    {
00058     Walking();
00059     WalkingAnimation();
00060    }
00061   }
00062 
00063   // Check left and right blocks again, because sometimes a door or mangling machine arm move away
00064   int mlx = (getXLeftPos()-1)>>CSF;
00065   int mrx = (getXRightPos()+1)>>CSF;
00066   int my = getYUpPos()>>CSF;
00067   std::vector<CTileProperties> &Tile = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(1);
00068   blockedr = Tile[mp_Map->at(mrx,my,1)].bleft;
00069   blockedl = Tile[mp_Map->at(mlx,my,1)].bright;
00070 
00071   checkSolidDoors();
00072 
00073   InertiaAndFriction_X();
00074 
00075   if(!level_done)
00076   {
00077    TogglePogo_and_Switches();
00078    JumpAndPogo();
00079   }
00080 
00081   // Check collision with other objects
00082   performCollisions();
00083   checkObjSolid();
00084   if(!inhibitfall) Playerfalling();
00085  }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void CPlayer::touchedExit(int mpx)
00089 {
00090  exitXpos = (mpx+2)<<TILE_S;
00091 
00092  if (!pjumping && !pfalling  &&
00093   !ppogostick && level_done==LEVEL_NOT_DONE)
00094  {
00095   // don't allow player to walk through a door if he's standing
00096   // on an object such as a platform or an enemy
00097   if (supportedbyobject) return;
00098   
00099   // TODO: in episode 2 on level 13 aka Rome Tantalus Ray, if
00100   // keen hasn't flipped the switch he shouldn't be able to
00101   // leave the level, this is a bug from the original game
00102   // that needs fixing, hopefully we will fix all of those
00103   // if player has ankh shut it off
00104   ankhtime = 0;
00105   
00106   ppogostick = false;
00107   
00108   g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00109   g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_LEVEL_DONE, PLAY_NOW);
00110   level_done = LEVEL_DONE_WALK;
00111   solid = false;
00112   inhibitfall = true;
00113  }
00114 }
00115 
00116 void CPlayer::walkbehindexitdoor()
00117 {
00118  int xb, diff, width;
00119  
00120     // don't draw keen as he walks through the door (past exitXpos)
00121     // X pixel position of right side of player
00122     xb = (getXRightPos())>>(STC);
00123     diff = (xb - exitXpos) + 6;        // dist between keen and door
00124     if (diff > 0)                             // past exitXpos?
00125     {
00126         width = (w>>(STC)) - diff;    // get new width of sprite
00127         if (width < 0) width = 0;               // don't set to negative
00128 
00129         int frame = playerbaseframe;
00130   if(m_episode == 3) frame++;
00131 
00132         // set new width of all player walk frames
00133         g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+0).setWidth(width);
00134         g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+1).setWidth(width);
00135   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+2).setWidth(width);
00136   g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(frame+3).setWidth(width);
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void CPlayer::kill()
00141 {
00142  kill(false);
00143 }
00144 
00145 void CPlayer::kill(bool force)
00146 {
00147  if(!force) // force can happens for example, when player leaves the map to the most lower-side
00148  {
00149   if (godmode || ankhtime || level_done) return;
00150  }
00151 
00152  if (!pdie)
00153  {
00154   godmode = false;
00155   solid = false;
00156   pdie = PDIE_DYING;
00157   pdieframe = 0;
00158   pdietimer = 0;
00159   pdietillfly = DIE_TILL_FLY_TIME;
00160   pdie_xvect = rand()%(DIE_MAX_XVECT*2);
00161   pdie_xvect -= DIE_MAX_XVECT;
00162   inventory.lives--;
00163   SelectFrame();
00164   g_pSound->playSound(SOUND_KEEN_DIE, PLAY_NOW);
00165   g_pMusicPlayer->stop();
00166 
00167   if(inventory.canlooseitem[0]) inventory.HasJoystick = false;
00168   if(inventory.canlooseitem[1]) inventory.HasBattery = false;
00169   if(inventory.canlooseitem[2]) inventory.HasVacuum = false;
00170   if(inventory.canlooseitem[3]) inventory.HasWiskey = false;
00171 
00172   for(size_t i = 0 ; i<4 ; i++)
00173    inventory.canlooseitem[i] = false;
00174  }
00175 }
00176 
00177 void CPlayer::dieanim() // Bad word for that. It's the entire die code
00178 {
00179  if (!pdie) return;                // should never happen...
00180  if (pdie==PDIE_DEAD) return;      // if true animation is over
00181  if (pdie==PDIE_FELLOFFMAP)
00182  {
00183   // wait for falling sound to complete, then kill the player
00184   if (!g_pSound->isPlaying(SOUND_KEEN_FALL))
00185   {
00186    pdie = 0;
00187    kill();
00188    // TODO: Not sure, what must go here! Check out!
00189   }
00190   else return;
00191  }
00192  
00193  // peridocally toggle dying animation frame
00194  if (pdietimer > DIE_ANIM_RATE)
00195  {
00196   pdieframe = 1 - pdieframe;
00197   pdietimer = 0;
00198  }
00199  else pdietimer++;
00200  
00201  // is it time to start flying off the screen?
00202  if (!pdietillfly)
00203  {  // time to fly off the screen
00204   if (((getYPosition()>>(CSF-4))+96 > mp_Map->m_scrolly) && (getYPosition()>(16<<(CSF-4))))
00205   {  // player has not reached top of screen
00206    // make player fly up
00207    moveUp(-PDIE_RISE_SPEED);
00208    if (getXPosition() > (4<<CSF))
00209    {
00210     moveXDir(pdie_xvect);
00211    }
00212   }
00213   else
00214   {  // reached top of screen. he's done.
00215    pdie = PDIE_DEAD;
00216   }
00217  }
00218  else
00219  {  // not yet time to fly off screen, decrement timer
00220   pdietillfly--;
00221  }  // end "time to fly"
00222 }
00223 
00224 void CPlayer::keencicle()
00225 {
00226  // keencicle code (when keen gets hit by an ice chunk)
00227  if(pfrozentime)
00228  {
00229   if (pfrozentime > PFROZEN_THAW)
00230   {
00231    if (pfrozenanimtimer > PFROZENANIMTIME)
00232    {
00233     if (pfrozenframe) pfrozenframe=0; else pfrozenframe=1;
00234     pfrozenanimtimer = 0;
00235    }
00236    else pfrozenanimtimer++;
00237   }
00238   else
00239   { // thawing out, show the thaw frame
00240    if (m_episode==3)
00241     pfrozenframe = 2;
00242    else
00243     pfrozenframe = 3;
00244   }
00245   
00246   pfrozentime--;
00247   inhibitwalking = true;
00248  }
00249 }
00250 
00251 // if player not sliding and not jumping, allow
00252 // them to change their direction. if jumping,
00253 // we can change direction but it will not be shown
00254 // in the frame.
00255 void CPlayer::setDir()
00256 {
00257  if (pfrozentime) return;
00258  // can't change direction on ice,
00259  // UNLESS we're stuck up against a wall
00260  if (psliding && pjumping < PJUMPED)
00261  {
00262   bool stuck = false;
00263   if (pshowdir == LEFT && blockedl) stuck = true;
00264   if (pshowdir == RIGHT && blockedr) stuck = true;
00265   if (stuck)
00266   {
00267    // jumped off an ice block into a wall?
00268    if (pjumping || pfalling)
00269    {
00270     psliding = false;
00271    }
00272   }
00273   else
00274   {
00275    // since we're not stuck up against a wall, we can't change direction
00276    return;
00277   }
00278  }
00279  
00280  if (!pjumping && !pfiring)
00281  {
00282   if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0 && xinertia < 0) { pdir = pshowdir = LEFT; }
00283   if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0 && xinertia > 0) { pdir = pshowdir = RIGHT; }
00284  }
00285  else
00286  {
00287   if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) { pdir = pshowdir = LEFT;  }
00288   if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) { pdir = pshowdir = RIGHT;  }
00289  }
00290 }
00291 
00292 // allow Keen to toggle the pogo stick and hit switches
00293 void CPlayer::TogglePogo_and_Switches()
00294 {
00295  int i;
00296  unsigned int mx, my;
00297  Uint16 t;
00298  
00299  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperty = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(1);
00300 
00301  // detect if KPOGO key only pressed
00302  if ( playcontrol[PA_POGO] && !pfrozentime && !lastpogo )
00303  {
00304   // if we are standing near a switch hit the switch instead
00305   mx = (getXMidPos())>>CSF;
00306   
00307   for(i=h;i>=0;i-=8)
00308   {
00309    my = (getYPosition()+i)>>CSF;
00310    
00311    t = mp_Map->at(mx, my);
00312 
00313    // check for extending-platform switch
00314    if ( TileProperty[t].behaviour == 25  ||  TileProperty[t].behaviour == 26 || TileProperty[t].behaviour == 23 )
00315    {
00316     // Flip the switch!
00317     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_SWITCH_TOGGLE, PLAY_NOW, getXPosition()>>STC);
00318     if ( TileProperty[t].behaviour == 26 && t == TILE_SWITCH_DOWN )
00319      mp_Map->changeTile(mx, my, TILE_SWITCH_UP);
00320     else if ( TileProperty[t].behaviour == 25 && t == TILE_SWITCH_UP )
00321      mp_Map->changeTile(mx, my, TILE_SWITCH_DOWN);
00322 
00323     // figure out where the platform is supposed to extend at
00324     // (this is coded in the object layer...
00325     // high byte is the Y offset and the low byte is the X offset,
00326     // and it's relative to the position of the switch.)
00327     Uint16 bridge = mp_Map->getObjectat(mx, my);
00328 
00329     if (bridge == 0) // Uh Oh! This means you have enabled a tantalus ray of the ship
00330     { // lightswitch
00331      if(TileProperty[t].behaviour == 23)
00332       m_Level_Trigger = LVLTRIG_LIGHT;
00333      else
00334       m_Level_Trigger = LVLTRIG_TANTALUS_RAY;
00335     }
00336     else
00337     {
00338      m_Level_Trigger = LVLTRIG_BRIDGE;
00339 
00340      char pxoff = (bridge & 0x00ff);
00341      char pyoff = (bridge & 0xff00) >> 8;
00342      int platx = mx + pxoff;
00343      int platy = my + pyoff;
00344 
00345      if(mp_Map->m_PlatExtending)
00346      {
00347       // Find the object responsible for extending
00348       std::vector<CObject*>::iterator obj = mp_object->begin();
00349       for( ; obj != mp_object->end() ; obj++ )
00350       {
00351        if((*obj)->m_type == OBJ_BRIDGE && (*obj)->exists &&
00352          (*obj)->getXPosition() == (mx<<CSF) &&
00353          (*obj)->getYPosition() == (my<<CSF) )
00354        {
00355         (*obj)->exists = false;
00356        }
00357       }
00358      }
00359      // spawn a "sector effector" to extend/retract the platform
00360      CBridges *platobject = new CBridges(mp_Map, mx<<CSF, my<<CSF,
00361        platx, platy);
00362      mp_object->push_back(platobject);
00363      mp_Map->m_PlatExtending = true;
00364     }
00365 
00366     ppogostick = false;
00367     break;
00368    }
00369   }
00370   
00371   // toggle pogo stick
00372   if (inventory.HasPogo && m_Level_Trigger == LVLTRIG_NONE)
00373   {
00374    ppogostick ^= 1;
00375    pogofirsttime = true;
00376   }
00377   lastpogo = true;
00378  }
00379 
00380  if(!playcontrol[PA_POGO]) lastpogo = false;
00381 }
00382 
00383 void CPlayer::JumpAndPogo()
00384 {
00385  CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00386 
00387  // handle the JUMP key, both for normal jumps and (high) pogo jumps
00388  if (!pjumping && !pfalling && !pfiring)
00389  {
00390   // give em the chance to jump
00391   if (playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && !ppogostick && !pfrozentime )
00392   {
00393    if(!psliding) xinertia = 0;
00394    pjumping = PPREPAREJUMP;
00395    pjumpframe = PPREPAREJUMPFRAME;
00396    pjumpanimtimer = 0;
00397    pwalking = false;
00398   }
00399   else if (ppogostick)
00400   {
00401    pjumping = PPREPAREPOGO;
00402    pjumpanimtimer = 0;
00403    pwalking = false;
00404   }
00405  }
00406 
00407     switch(pjumping)
00408     {
00409   case PPREPAREPOGO:
00410    if(ppogostick)
00411    {
00412     if (pjumpanimtimer>PPOGO_PREPARE_TIME)
00413     {
00414      pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed;
00415 
00416      pjumpframe = PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME;
00417      pjumping = PPOGOING;
00418 
00419      // continously bounce while pogo stick is out
00420      g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_JUMP, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00421 
00422      // jump high if JUMP key down, else bounce low
00423      if (playcontrol[PA_JUMP])
00424      {
00425       if (!mp_option[OPT_SUPERPOGO].value)
00426       {  // normal high pogo jump
00427        if(playcontrol[PA_JUMP] > 12 || !mp_option[OPT_IMPPOGO].value)
00428        {
00429         if(!pogofirsttime)
00430         {
00431          int jump = PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed;
00432          int pogo = PhysicsSettings.player.maxpogospeed;
00433          pjumpupspeed = 3*(pogo-jump)*playcontrol[PA_JUMP] / 50 + jump;
00434 
00435          if(pjumpupspeed > PhysicsSettings.player.maxpogospeed)
00436           pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxpogospeed;
00437 
00438          pogofirsttime = false;
00439         }
00440         else
00441          pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxpogospeed;
00442        }
00443        else if(playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && pogofirsttime)
00444        {
00445         pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.impossiblepogospeed;
00446        }
00447       }
00448       else
00449       {
00450        pjumpupspeed = PPOGOUP_SPEED_SUPER;
00451       }
00452      }
00453      else pogofirsttime = false;
00454      pjumpframe = PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME;
00455      pjumping = PPOGOING;
00456     } else pjumpanimtimer++;
00457    }
00458    else pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00459    break;
00460   case PPREPAREJUMP:
00461    if (pjumpanimtimer > PJUMP_PREPARE_ANIM_RATE)
00462    {
00463     if (pjumpframe == PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME || !playcontrol[PA_JUMP])
00464     {   // time to start the jump
00465      // select a jump depending on how long keen was preparing
00466      pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed;
00467 
00468      if(pjumpframe > PPREPAREJUMPFRAME+4)
00469       pjumpupspeed = PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed;
00470      else
00471       pjumpupspeed = (PhysicsSettings.player.maxjumpspeed*(pjumpframe-PPREPAREJUMPFRAME))/5;
00472      
00473      pjumpframe = PJUMP_PREPARE_LAST_FRAME;
00474      g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_JUMP, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00475      pjumping = PJUMPUP;
00476      
00477      // make so if we're jumping left or right
00478      // the walk code will start at full speed
00479      pwalking = 1;
00480      pwalkanimtimer = 0;
00481      pwalkframe = 1;
00482      if ( psliding )
00483      { // on ice, always jump direction facing
00484       if (pshowdir==LEFT) pdir=LEFT;
00485       else pdir=RIGHT;
00486      }
00487      else
00488       pjumpdir = UP;
00489      
00490      pwalkincreasetimer = 0;
00491      if(playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) xinertia = -PhysicsSettings.player.jumpdecrease_x;
00492      if(playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) xinertia = PhysicsSettings.player.jumpdecrease_x;
00493     }
00494     else pjumpframe++;
00495 
00496     pjumpanimtimer=0;
00497    } else pjumpanimtimer++;
00498    break;
00499         case PJUMPUP:
00500         case PPOGOING:
00501    // do the jump
00502          // check for hitting a ceiling
00503          if (blockedu)   // did we bonk something?
00504          {  // immediatly abort the jump
00505           if(!bumped)
00506           {
00507            g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_BUMPHEAD, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00508               bumped = true;
00509           }
00510           pjumpupspeed = 0;
00511          }
00512 
00513    if (!pjumptime)
00514    {
00515     if (pjumpupspeed <= 0)
00516     {
00517      pjumpupspeed = 0;
00518      pfallspeed = PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed;
00519      pjumping = PJUMPLAND;
00520     }
00521     else
00522     {
00523      pjumpupspeed-=pjumpupspeed_decrease;
00524     }
00525    }
00526    else pjumptime--;
00527    
00528    moveUp(pjumpupspeed);
00529    pjustjumped = true;
00530 
00531    break;
00532         case PJUMPLAND:
00533    // do the jump
00534 
00535    if (!pjumptime)
00536    {
00537     if (blockedd)
00538     {
00539      pjumpupspeed = 0;
00540      pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00541     }
00542     else
00543     {
00544      if(pjumpupspeed < PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed)
00545       pjumpupspeed+=pjumpupspeed_decrease*2;
00546      else
00547      {
00548       pjumpupspeed=PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed;
00549       pjumping = PNOJUMP;
00550      }
00551     }
00552    }
00553    else pjumptime--;
00554 
00555    moveDown(pjumpupspeed);
00556    pjustjumped = true;
00557 
00558    break;
00559         default:
00560          break;
00561     }
00562  
00563  // Now check how much the direction of the player is given
00564     // (The real inertia in x-direction)
00565  if(pjumping)
00566  {
00567   if(!ppogostick)
00568   {
00569    if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0)
00570     xinertia-=4;
00571    if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0)
00572     xinertia+=4;
00573   }
00574   else if(ppogostick)
00575   {
00576    if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0)
00577     xinertia -= (PhysicsSettings.player.pogoforce_x/10);
00578    if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0)
00579     xinertia += (PhysicsSettings.player.pogoforce_x/10);
00580   }
00581  }
00582  else if(pfalling)
00583  {
00584   if(!ppogostick) {
00585    if(xinertia<0) xinertia+=2;
00586    if(xinertia>0) xinertia-=2;
00587   }
00588 
00589   if (playcontrol[PA_X] < 0)
00590    xinertia-=4;
00591   if (playcontrol[PA_X] > 0)
00592    xinertia+=4;
00593  }
00594  
00595     // If we are in Godmode, use the Pogo, and pressing the jump button, make the player fly
00596     if( godmode && ppogostick )
00597     {
00598      //if(playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) xinertia-=4;
00599      //if(playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) xinertia+=4;
00600      if(playcontrol[PA_X] < 0) xinertia-=3;
00601      if(playcontrol[PA_X] > 0) xinertia+=3;
00602      if(playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && !blockedu)
00603       moveUp(PPOGOUP_SPEED);
00604     }
00605 
00606  // if we jump against a wall all inertia stops
00607  if (xinertia > 0 && blockedr) xinertia = 0;
00608  if (xinertia < 0 && blockedl) xinertia = 0;
00609 }
00610 
00611 void CPlayer::Playerfalling()
00612 {
00613 char behaviour;
00614 std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperty = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00615 CPhysicsSettings &PhysicsSettings = g_pBehaviorEngine->getPhysicsSettings();
00616 
00617  if (pfalling)
00618  {
00619   bumped = false;
00620   if (plastfalling == 0)
00621   {
00622    if (!pjustjumped)
00623     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_FALL, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00624   }
00625  }
00626 
00627  // save fall state so we can detect the high/low-going edges
00628  plastfalling = pfalling;
00629 
00630  if(pdie) return;
00631 
00632  // do not fall if we're jumping
00633  if (pjumping)
00634  {
00635   psemisliding = false;
00636   return;
00637  }
00638 
00639  // ** determine if player should fall (nothing solid is beneath him) **
00640  int xleft  = getXLeftPos();
00641  int ydown  = getYDownPos();
00642 
00643  behaviour = TileProperty[mp_Map->at(xleft>>CSF, ydown>>CSF)].behaviour;
00644  if( behaviour>=2 && behaviour<=5 )
00645   blockedu = true; // This workaround prevents the player from falling through doors.
00646 
00647  if(!blockedd && !pjumping && !supportedbyobject)
00648  { // lower-left isn't solid, check right side
00649   pfalling = true;        // so fall.
00650   pjustfell = true;
00651  }
00652  else
00653  {
00654   pfalling = false;
00655   psliding = false;
00656   psemisliding = false;
00657 
00658   // Check if player is on iceplayer.
00659   if(!pjumping && !ppogostick)
00660   {
00661    int ice = TileProperty[mp_Map->at(getXLeftPos()>>CSF, (ydown+(1<<STC))>>CSF)].slippery;
00662    ice |= TileProperty[mp_Map->at(getXRightPos()>>CSF, (ydown+(1<<STC))>>CSF)].slippery;
00663    if(!blockedl && !blockedr)
00664    {
00665     if(ice == 2) psemisliding = true;
00666     else if(ice == 3) psliding = true;
00667    }
00668   }
00669  }
00670 
00671  // ** if the player should be falling, well what are we waiting for?
00672  //    make him fall! **
00673  if (pfalling)
00674  {  // nothing solid under player, let's make him fall
00675   psemisliding = 0;
00676 
00677   // gradually increase the fall speed up to maximum rate
00678   if (pfallspeed>PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed)
00679    pfallspeed = PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed;
00680   else if (pfallspeed<PhysicsSettings.max_fallspeed)
00681    pfallspeed += PhysicsSettings.fallspeed_increase;
00682 
00683   // add current fall speed to player Y or make him fly in godmode with pogo
00684   if( !godmode || !ppogostick || !g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(IC_JUMP) )
00685    moveDown(pfallspeed);
00686  }
00687  else
00688  {  // not falling
00689   if (plastfalling)
00690   {  // just now stopped falling
00691    if (pdie != PDIE_FELLOFFMAP)
00692     g_pSound->stopSound(SOUND_KEEN_FALL);  // terminate fall noise
00693    // thud noise
00694    if (!ppogostick)
00695     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_LAND, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00696    // fix "sliding" effect when you fall, go one way, then
00697    // before you land turn around and as you hit the ground
00698    // you're starting to move the other direction
00699    // (set inertia to 0 if it's contrary to player's current dir)
00700   }
00701   pfallspeed = 0;
00702  }   // close "not falling"
00703 
00704  // ensure no sliding if we fall or jump off of ice
00705  if (pfalling || pjumping) psliding=0;
00706 
00707  // If he falls to the ground even being god, kill him
00708  if( (Uint16)getYDownPos() > ((mp_Map->m_height)<<CSF) )
00709   kill(true);
00710 }
00711 
00712 // wouldn't it be cool if keen had a raygun, and he could shoot things?
00713 // oh wait, he does, and here's the code for it.
00714 void CPlayer::raygun()
00715 {
00716  bool canRefire;
00717  
00718  if (pfireframetimer) pfireframetimer--;
00719  
00720  // FIRE button down, and not keencicled?
00721  if ( playcontrol[PA_FIRE] && !pfrozentime && !(g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KC) && g_pInput->getHoldedKey(KT)) )
00722  { // fire is pressed
00723   inhibitwalking = 1;            // prevent moving
00724   pfiring = true;  // flag that we're firing
00725   ppogostick = false;            // put away pogo stick if out
00726   
00727   // limit how quickly shots can be fired
00728   if ( !plastfire || mp_option[OPT_FULLYAUTOMATIC].value )
00729   {
00730    if (pfireframetimer < PFIRE_LIMIT_SHOT_FREQ_FA) canRefire = true;
00731    else canRefire = false;
00732   }
00733   else
00734   {
00735    if (pfireframetimer<PFIRE_LIMIT_SHOT_FREQ && !plastfire) canRefire = true;
00736    else canRefire = false;
00737   }
00738   
00739   if (canRefire)
00740   {
00741    // show raygun for a minimum time even if FIRE is immediatly released
00742    pfireframetimer = PFIRE_SHOWFRAME_TIME;
00743    
00744    // try to fire off a blast
00745    if (inventory.charges)
00746    {  // we have enough charges
00747     int xdir, ydir;
00748     inventory.charges--;
00749     pshowdir = pdir;
00750     
00751     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_KEEN_FIRE, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00752     
00753     ydir = getYPosition()+(9<<STC);
00754     if (pdir==RIGHT) xdir = getXRightPos()+xinertia;
00755     else xdir = getXLeftPos()+xinertia-(16<<STC);
00756 
00757     CRay *rayobject = new CRay(mp_Map, xdir, ydir, pdir, OBJ_PLAYER, m_index);
00758     rayobject->setSpeed(124);
00759     
00760     mp_object->push_back(rayobject);
00761    }
00762    else
00763    { // uh oh, out of bullets
00764     // click!
00765     g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_GUN_CLICK, PLAY_NOW, scrx);
00766     
00767    }  // end "do we have charges?"
00768   } // end "limit how quickly shots can be fired"
00769   plastfire = true;
00770  } // end "fire button down and not keencicled"
00771  else
00772  { // FIRE button is NOT down
00773   // put away ray gun after it's shown for the minimum period of time
00774   if (!pfireframetimer)
00775   {  // ray gun shown for minimum time
00776    pfiring = 0;
00777   }
00778   else
00779   {  // minimum time not expired
00780    pfiring = 1;
00781    inhibitwalking = 1;
00782   }
00783   plastfire = false;
00784  }
00785 }
00786 
00787 // select the appropriate player frame based on what he's doing
00788 void CPlayer::SelectFrame()
00789 {
00790     sprite = playerbaseframe;      // basic standing
00791  
00792  if (m_episode==3) sprite++;
00793 
00794     // select the frame assuming he's pointing right. ep1 does not select
00795     // a walk frame while fading--this is for the bonus teleporter in L13.
00796     if (pdie) sprite += PDIEFRAME + pdieframe;
00797     else
00798     {
00799         if (pfrozentime) sprite = PFRAME_FROZEN + pfrozenframe;
00800         else if (pfiring) sprite += PFIREFRAME;
00801         else if (ppogostick) sprite += PFRAME_POGO + (pjumping==PPREPAREPOGO);
00802         else if (pjumping) sprite += pjumpframe;
00803         else if (pfalling) sprite += 13;
00804         else if (pwalking || psemisliding) sprite += pwalkframe;
00805     }
00806  
00807     // if he's going left switch the frame selected above to the
00808     // appropriate one for the left direction
00809     if (pshowdir==LEFT && !pdie && !pfrozentime)
00810     {
00811   if (pfiring)
00812   {
00813    sprite++;
00814   }
00815   else if (ppogostick)
00816   {
00817    sprite+=2;
00818   }
00819   else if (pjumping || pfalling)
00820   {
00821    sprite+=6;
00822   }
00823   else
00824   {
00825    sprite+=4;
00826   }
00827     }
00828 }
00829 
00830 
00831 const int bumpamount = 40;
00832 
00833 // yorp/scrub etc "bump".
00834 // if solid = false, player can possibly force his way through.
00835 // if solid = true, object acts like a solid "wall".
00836 void CPlayer::bump( CObject &theObject, direction_t direction )
00837 {
00838  if( pjumping == PPREPAREJUMP || pjumping == PPREPAREPOGO || dead || level_done!=LEVEL_NOT_DONE )
00839   return;
00840 
00841  g_pSound->playStereofromCoord(SOUND_YORP_BUMP, PLAY_NORESTART, scrx);
00842 
00843  pshowdir = pdir = direction;
00844  xinertia += (direction==RIGHT) ? bumpamount : -bumpamount;
00845  pwalking = true;
00846 }
00847 
00848 // Scrub, etc "push".
00849 void CPlayer::push( CObject &theObject )
00850 {
00851  if( dead || level_done!=LEVEL_NOT_DONE )
00852   return;
00853 
00854  int obj_lx = theObject.getXLeftPos();
00855  int obj_midx = theObject.getXMidPos();
00856  int obj_rx = theObject.getXRightPos();
00857  int lx = getXLeftPos();
00858  int midx = getXMidPos();
00859  int rx = getXRightPos();
00860 
00861  if( midx < obj_midx )
00862  {
00863   moveLeft(rx - obj_lx);
00864   pdir = pshowdir = LEFT;
00865  }
00866 
00867  if( midx > obj_midx )
00868  {
00869   moveRight(obj_rx - lx);
00870   pdir = pshowdir = RIGHT;
00871  }
00872  pwalking = true;
00873 }
00874 
00875 void CPlayer::checkSolidDoors()
00876 {
00877  int mx1 = getXLeftPos();
00878  int mx2 = getXRightPos();
00879  int my1 = getYUpPos();
00880  int my2 = getYDownPos();
00881  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperty = g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties();
00882 
00883  for( size_t my=my1 ; my<my2 ; my+=(1<<STC) )
00884  {
00885   if( (TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx1>>CSF, my>>CSF)].behaviour>1 &&
00886     TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx1>>CSF, my>>CSF)].behaviour<6 ) )
00887   {
00888    blockedl = true; break;
00889   }
00890  }
00891 
00892  for( size_t my=my1 ; my<my2 ; my+=(1<<STC) )
00893  {
00894   if( (TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx2>>CSF, my>>CSF)].behaviour>1 &&
00895     TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx2>>CSF, my>>CSF)].behaviour<6 ) )
00896   {
00897    blockedr = true; break;
00898   }
00899  }
00900 
00901  for( size_t mx=mx1 ; mx<mx2 ; mx+=(1<<STC) )
00902  {
00903   if( (TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx>>CSF, my1>>CSF)].behaviour>1 &&
00904     TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx>>CSF, my1>>CSF)].behaviour<6 ) )
00905   {
00906    blockedd = true; break;
00907   }
00908  }
00909 
00910  for( size_t mx=mx1 ; mx<mx2 ; mx+=(1<<STC) )
00911  {
00912   if( (TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx>>CSF, my2>>CSF)].behaviour>1 &&
00913     TileProperty[mp_Map->at(mx>>CSF, my2>>CSF)].behaviour<6 ) )
00914   {
00915    blockedu = true; break;
00916   }
00917  }
00918 }
00919 
00920 int CPlayer::pollLevelTrigger()
00921 {
00922  int trigger = m_Level_Trigger;
00923  m_Level_Trigger = LVLTRIG_NONE;
00924  return trigger;
00925 }
00926 
00927 void CPlayer::getShotByRay()
00928 {
00929  if (pfrozentime)
00930  {
00931   if( pfrozentime > PFROZEN_THAW )
00932    pfrozentime = PFROZEN_THAW;
00933 
00934   if(g_pBehaviorEngine->getEpisode() == 1)
00935    return;
00936  }
00937  else
00938  {
00939   kill();
00940  }
00941 }
